file_content.text: Imperial clan is finished. Honor fighting by your side.
Good! We are not waiting for Republic clan!
Our clan holds against Imperial clan but barely. We must talk quickly.
When they saw the distress flare, Aurek Base thought you were about to be slaughtered.
I thought you were in trouble.
Our clan endures. But we hear no new orders from Republic clan. Imperials cut off all communication. We do not know where the fighting is.
You're not in danger of being overwhelmed here. What's the problem?
We hear nothing from Aurek Base. Imperial clan cuts off our communications. Our clan believes we must leave our post to see if Republic clan needs aid.
Do we fall back to defend Aurek Base? We must know if our allies live. Our clan must know where we are needed most.
South is the central communication relay. Take this and try to fix it. Hurry! Imperial clan comes!
Our clan fights against Imperial clan. Our clan endures.
